idea:
ABOUT ANSSOLVER

“Teaching how to think, not what to think” is the philosophy, the founders of ANSSOLVER believe in.

ANSSOLVER is an education platform (e-learning website www.anssolver.com ) dedicated to helping Cambridge Students learn, practice and revise for their IGCSE, AS Level and A Level exams.

ANSSOLVER aspires to be the

#1 Past Paper Video Solution & Concept Capsule provider for Cambridge IGCSE, ASLevel & ALevel in the world.

#1 Global e- learning platform for Cambridge students which provides step by step video solutions of Past Paper questions for Mathematics and Accounts to begin with.


Value Proposition of ANSSOLVER

1. Technology enabled World class e-learning experience: Providing access to quality learning anywhere, anytime and on any device.

o Through ANSSOLVER’s self-learning videos, student can get access anywhere, anytime on laptop, tablet as well as on mobile.

o Leverage technology to provide Smart Tech, Interactive and engaging learning module; enable data analytics to provide personalised learning programs designed for every student.


2. Personalised self-paced learning journey: Every student needs are different and sometimes they find it difficult to follow the steps involved in problem solving and are embarrassed to ask doubts.

o ANSSOLVER enables students to undertake self-paced learning, can watch the video many number of times, can save the videos in “My WatchList” and ANSSOLVER’s analytics engine recommends questions to be revised before the exams.

o Though step by step video solutions to problems and concept capsules, ANSSOLVER bridges the gap between concept and problem solving; inspires confidence in students to excel in exams.


3. Competent Educators and Engaging content: Visualisation provides better grasping and a holistic approach for students to excel in exams besides life-long conceptual understanding.

o ANSSOLVER provides students from the best educators

 step by step video solutions of the past papers questions,

 concept video capsules,

 topic wise video solutions,

 a recommended list for last minute revision

 a personalised page to save your questions and revise before the exams

 Popular videos and

 Trending videos
name: ANS SOLVER
